name: Empty Project Template - with pages/styles
description:
A very simple starter template with all you need for your new project to get up and running in no time!


This boilerplate contains a few default pages such as:


  • Cover (so you can easily get a nice preview of your project)
  • Colors (a few prepared swatches and color styles for your brand colors)
  • Typography (text styles for: h1-h6 big / default, body big / default and quote)
  • Components (a few frames setup for your: logos, buttons, forms, icons, graphics, photos)
  • References (a page where you can place screenshots and inspirational stuff)
  • Explorations (this is where you can try out different design ideas before they go into the design)
  • Landing page (the actual design work page, prepared with frames for Desktop, MacBook Pro, iPad and iPhone. All with a 12 column grid style.)
